description.english: Reach max level in Alchemy.
description.schinese: 江湖技艺炼丹达到满级
description.tchinese: 江湖技藝煉丹達到滿級

description.english: Achieve Unrivalled in Power.
Learn the Yoga Sutras.
Open more than 10 different chests.
Join Wudang Sect.
Pet the cat at the Luo Village Inn.
Become a senior disciple.
Invite Tiedan to the party.
Become an elite disciple.
Become a martial disciple.
Help Wang Jun pay for his debt in Pingkang City.
Become a discipline disciple.
Win first place in the sect contest.
Become a Zhenwu Hall chief disciple.
Self reflect and transcribe 50 Martial Arts Wisdoms.
Learn a swordplay from a white ape.
Reach 1,000 Qi Gathering Speed.
Learn all the Cultivation Methods of Wudang and Shaolin.
description.schinese: 学会武当和少林所有心法
description.tchinese: 學會武當和少林所有心法

description.english: Forge any Class II·Premium armor.
description.schinese: 锻造出任意一品上防具
description.tchinese: 鍛造出任意一品上防具

description.english: Forge any Class II·Premium weapon.
description.schinese: 锻造出任意一品上武器
description.tchinese: 鍛造出任意一品上武器

description.english: Start the game with 4 Mythic (red) Cultivation Methods.
Reach max level in Cooking.
description.schinese: 江湖技艺烹饪达到满级
description.tchinese: 江湖技藝烹飪達到滿級

description.english: Reach max level in Fishing.
description.schinese: 江湖技艺钓鱼达到满级
description.tchinese: 江湖技藝釣魚達到滿級

description.english: Reach max level in Collecting.
description.schinese: 江湖技艺采集达到满级
description.tchinese: 江湖技藝採集達到滿級

description.english: Reach max level in Forging.
description.schinese: 江湖技艺锻造达到满级
description.tchinese: 江湖技藝鍛造達到滿級

description.english: Reach max level in Tailoring.
description.schinese: 江湖技艺制衣达到满级
description.tchinese: 江湖技藝製衣達到滿級

description.english: Own 1 million coins.
Spar with and defeat all sect leaders.
description.schinese: 与全门派掌门切磋且获胜
description.tchinese: 與全門派掌門切磋且獲勝

description.english: Strike all acupoints of all Meridians of any party member.
Complete the Cloudform Tai Chi trial.
Reach max level in Elusive Liuyao Swordplay.
Form the complete Blazing Divination.
Win the first battle of Bai Weiyi's pursuit in 10 turns (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难白惟一追击战第一场10回合内获胜
description.tchinese: 極難白惟一追擊戰第一場10回合內獲勝

description.english: Learn Proud Dragon Repents.
Learn Tai Chi, Tai Chi Swordplay, Tai Chi Marvel Force, and Cloudform Tai Chi.
description.schinese: 学会太极拳，太极剑，太极神功、云相太极
description.tchinese: 學會太極拳，太極劍，太極神功、雲相太極

description.english: Strike all acupoints of all Meridians of Yuwen Yi.
Forge one Majestic Windcloud.
description.schinese: 成功锻造任意一件风云奕
description.tchinese: 成功鍛造任意一件風雲奕

description.english: Complete the Chenghuang Trial.
Ouyang Xue and Di Zui win the defending battle in Phoenix Cave (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式凤凰洞欧阳雪、涤罪僧留防守获胜
description.tchinese: 極難模式鳳凰洞歐陽雪、滌罪僧留防守獲勝

description.english: Win both Yan Weihuan's defending battles (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式燕未还断后二连战全胜
description.tchinese: 極難模式燕未還斷後二連戰全勝

displayName.english: Defeat The Seal Lord Of Perpetuity

description.english: Win the final battle against Bai Weiyi in 24 turns (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式白惟一最终战24回合内获胜
description.tchinese: 極難模式白惟一最終戰24回合內獲勝

description.english: Catch all types of fish.
Collect all Cultivation Method manuals.
description.schinese: 成功收集所有心法秘籍
description.tchinese: 成功收集所有心法秘籍

description.tchinese: 成功收集所有拳法秘籍

description.tchinese: 成功收集所有暗器秘籍

description.english: Complete the Five Balances Sutra trial.
Defeat Bai Weiyi alone (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式单人战胜白惟一
description.tchinese: 極難模式單人戰勝白惟一

description.english: Defeat Wuming in Valley of Dragons' Slumber.
Invite all party members.
Achieve all main story endings.
Invite Shangguan Hong to the party.
Invite Chen Linxi to the party.
Invite Kong Liang to the party.
Invite Bai Jin to the party.
Invite Wei Huo to the party.
Invite Huo Changqing to the party.
Invite Lü Xian'er to the party.
Invite Ye Fei to the party.
Invite Sima Ling to the party.
Invite Li Yuanxing to the party.
Invite Yan Weihuan to the party.
Invite Frosty Condor to the party.
Invite Di Zui to the party.
Invite Leng Wuqing to the party.
Invite Shang Tingzhu to the party.
Invite Xun Yaoyao to the party.
Invite Duan Lüshuang to the party.
Invite Duan Zhaochen to the party.
Invite Yia Vang to the party.
Heal Moli.
Encounter two of the Three Geniuses at Lotus Lake.
Solve the White Jade Tiger Token quest.
Achieve Xun Yaoyao's hidden ending.
Achieve Shangguan Hong's hidden ending.
Achieve Frosty Condor's hidden ending.
Achieve Li Yuanxing, Yan Weihuan, and Xun Yaoyao's hidden ending.
description.schinese: 达成李元兴、燕未还、荀杳杳隐藏结局
description.tchinese: 達成李元興、燕未還、荀杳杳隱藏結局

description.english: Achieve Leng Wuqing and Li Yuanxing's hidden ending.
description.schinese: 达成冷无情、李元兴隐藏结局
description.tchinese: 達成冷無情、李元興隱藏結局

description.english: Assist Di Zui in mastering Bodhidharma's Scripture.
description.schinese: 协助涤罪僧修成《达摩武经》
description.tchinese: 協助滌罪僧修成《達摩武經》

description.english: Defeat Dharma Eclipse (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式下击败法灭尽
description.tchinese: 極難模式下擊敗法滅盡

description.english: Defeat Mara Kama (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式下击败天魔迦摩
description.tchinese: 極難模式下擊敗天魔迦摩

description.english: Defeat Fulongzi at Buddha's Hollow (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式下天佛窟之役击败伏龙子
description.tchinese: 極難模式下天佛窟之役擊敗伏龍子

description.english: Defeat Helian Fubi (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式下击败赫连辅弼
description.tchinese: 極難模式下擊敗赫連輔弼

description.english: Defeat the young sect representatives during the alliance meeting (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式六派共议中击败各派年轻代表
description.tchinese: 極難模式六派共議中擊敗各派年輕代表

description.english: Obtain the Omniscient Consciousness.
Leng Wuqing comprehends Jianghu Magnanimity.
description.schinese: 使冷无情领悟江湖器量
description.tchinese: 使冷無情領悟江湖器量

description.english: Obtain the Seal of Perpetuity.
Obtain the Star Chart of Ziwei and its Directions.
description.schinese: 取得紫微星图及紫微星图·解
description.tchinese: 取得紫微星圖及紫微星圖·解

description.english: Agree to rebuild Tianji Palace.
Ouyang Xue wins the defending battle in Phoenix Cave (Extreme Difficulty).
description.schinese: 极难模式凤凰洞欧阳雪单人防守获胜
description.tchinese: 極難模式鳳凰洞歐陽雪單人防守獲勝

description.english: Unlock all Legacies.
The difficulty score reaches 3.1 in the Settlement.
Invite Lianxin to the party.
Open more than 200 different chests (can be completed across multiple saves).
description.schinese: 开启200个以上不同宝箱（可多个存档完成）
description.tchinese: 開啟200個以上不同寶箱（可多個存檔完成）

description.english: Invite Bu Weiyue to the party.
Solve the mysteries on Monkey Mountain.
Solve the mysteries on Turtle Island.
Obtain Master Qingyun's legacy.
Obtain Mountain's Reflection.
Obtain Qingyun Fan.
Thwart Yin-Yang School's plot.
Help Lü Xian'er and the Ye siblings complete their lessons.
description.schinese: 协助叶家兄妹和吕仙儿完成课业
description.tchinese: 協助葉家兄妹和呂仙兒完成課業

description.english: Lü Xian'er masters Conquest Doctrine.
description.schinese: 吕仙儿领悟万里平戎策
description.tchinese: 呂仙兒領悟萬里平戎策

description.english: Unlock Lü Xian'er's new portrait.
Learn about the past of the first Lady Xuan.
Defeat the Thunder Envoy.
Create Drifting Cloud Tai Chi.
Complete all Mirage Realms challenges.
